name: Dogecoin Clicker (2014)
description:
This right here was the game that I wrote in high school as a little toddler (nah, I was actually 14) to put up as a hidden game for my Tumblr blog. I promoted this game with my friend and then I was endlessly tortured to no end by frequent mocking mentions about the game.

Thank god it's 2019 and I am no longer in contact with ANYONE from that place, but I am willing to put this up on my itch.io along with my other failed game projects.
